nodes.text: Syclos, also known as Syclos the Lame, was a Force-sensitive female wizard and the alleged author of a Grimoire that came to be held with great reverence on Weik. The book contained what the Weikians considered to be mad ravings and was little studied by the sages of the world, as it was nigh-indecipherable. While the book was marked by the symbol of the Jedi Order, Syclos' affiliation with the Jedi was lost to history.
